alert.note: Alert for Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 12 at 9:23AM CDT until September 14 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Pecatonica River at Freeport affecting Stephenson County. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Pecatonica River at Freeport. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to early Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water affects low lying sections of Freeport mainly east of the Pecatonica River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
